page-find-wallet-description: Walet na adana cinikayyan ku na ETH. Zaka iya zaɓa daga abubuwa daban-daban da suka tafi da abunda kake so.
page-find-wallet-meta-description: Nema kuma ka bambanta walet na Ethereum akan yanayin da kake so.
page-find-wallet-open-source-desc: Buɗɗen tushen manhaja yana ba kowa damar bincika amincin manhaja
page-find-wallet-non-custodial-desc: Walet ɗin da baya sarrafa ma makullan sirri
page-find-wallet-hardware-wallet-support: Walet da za'a iya jonawa da na'urar walat domin inganta tsaro
page-find-wallet-rpc-importing-desc: Walet masu tallafawa abubuwan ƙarshe na RPC na al'ada don na'ura zuwa nodes ko hanyoyin sadarwa daban-daban
page-find-wallet-nft-support-desc: Walet dake taimakawa wajen dubi da kasuwanci tare da NFTs
page-find-wallet-connect-to-dapps-desc: Zaka iya haɗawa zuwa manhajojin dake taimakawa WalletConnect ko makamancin hakan
page-find-wallet-staking-desc: Sa ETH kai tsaye daga walet
page-find-wallet-swaps-desc: Musanyan kuɗin ERC-20 kai tsaye daga walet
page-find-wallet-layer-2-desc: Walat mai tallafawa Ethereum a layer 2s
page-find-wallet-gas-fee-customization-d: Keɓance adadin gas ɗin ku (kuɗin tushe, ƙimar fifiko, da maƙurar kuɗin aiki)
page-find-wallet-ens-support-desc: Walet da ke tallafawa Ethereum Name Service (ENS)
page-find-wallet-token-importing-desc: Shigo da kowane kuɗin ERC-20 don amfani da shi cikin walet
page-find-wallet-buy-crypto-desc:
Siya kiripto tare da fiat kai tsaye a cikin walet
 * Bayanan kula: siyan kiripto na iya zama a cikin takamaiman yanki
page-find-wallet-sell-for-fiat-desc:
Sayar da kiripton don fiat kai tsaye a cikin walat 
 * Bayanan Kula: cire kiripto na iya zama takamaiman yanki
page-find-wallet-multisig-desc: Walet waɗanda ke buƙatar sa hannu da yawa don ba da izinin ciniki
page-find-wallet-social-recovery-desc: Walet waɗanda ke ba wa masu kulawa damar canza maɓallin sa hannu don walet ɗin smart contract
page-find-wallet-new-to-crypto-desc: Mai farawa yana buƙatar walet kafun farawa.
page-find-wallet-nfts-desc: Walet tare da mayar da hankali kan tallafin NFT.
page-find-wallet-hodler-desc: Riƙe kuɗi tare da walat ɗin kayan aiki.
page-find-wallet-finance-desc: Walet da ke mai da hankali kan yawan amfani da manhajojin DeFi.
page-find-wallet-developer-desc: Walet da suke taimakawa wajen ƙirƙirar da kuma gwajin dapps.
page-find-wallet-footnote-1: Walet ɗin da aka jera akan wannan shafin ba tallafi bane na hukuma, kuma an bayar da su don dalilai na bayanai kawai.
page-find-wallet-footnote-2: An ba da bayanan su ta hanyar ayyukan walat ɗin da kansu.
page-find-wallet-footnote-3: Muna ƙara samfura zuwa wannan shafin bisa ga sharuɗɗa na cikin manufofin jeri. Idan kuna son mu ƙara walet, taro batu a GitHub.
page-find-wallet-empty-results-desc: Babu walet da ya dace da ma'aunin ka, gwada cire wasu masu matatun.
